subject: Tour of California (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Levi Leipheimer defended his title Sunday, but the jury is out on whether he convinced Tour de France organizers that they made a mistake by excluding him and his team from this year’s race.
snippet: Levi Leipheimer defended his title Sunday, but the jury is out on whether he convinced Tour de France organizers that they made a mistake by excluding him and his team from this year’s race.
